name: noticegenerator
description: Simple generation of Black Duck notice file
author: ProductTech

inputs.name: blackduckconnection
inputs.label: Service connection name for Black Duck

inputs.name: localNoticeFileDirectory
inputs.label: Directory of local notice file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory of local notice file used by Black Duck

inputs.name: generateNoticeFile
inputs.label: Boolean on whether to create notice file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Boolean on whether to trigger generation of notice file in Black Duck

inputs.name: getLatestNoticeFile
inputs.label: Boolean on whether to get latest notice file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Boolean on whether to get latest notice file from Black Duck

inputs.name: modifyNoticeFile
inputs.label: Boolean on whether to modify notice file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Boolean on whether to modify notice file by replacing some of the Black Duck generated text
